title: Around the World in 80 Men
description: Alternative cover edition of ASIN B008Z9AVE8This is the collection of books 1-5 of the Around the World in 80 Men series.*Around the World in 80 Men*Scotland*Australia*Italy*IrelandMorgan Holland is a beautiful, young, waitress who has struggled to find her way in life. Unlucky in love and unsure about her future, she has a chance meeting with someone who offers to change her life.Excerpt:Julianne smiled at her apprentice, nodding before taking a sip of wine. “That's the big secret, Morgan. That's all there is to it. Any guy can find a street hooker, they're a dime a dozen, you know this. But women like us,” she pointed her index finger back and forth between the two of them, “no, no, we're not a dime a dozen, child. Like goddamn diamonds, we are."
author: Brandi Ratliff
